channel.title: Is my computer good enough to Host a server :S?
channel.description:
I was just wondering if my computer would be good enough to run a server .. Windows 7 Rate thingy between 1.0 to 7.9 Processor: 7.1 RAM: 7.1 Graphics: 7.3 Gaming Graphics: 7.3 Hard Disk: 5.9
Specs Processor: Q6600 Quad Core Ram: 4gb Graphics card.. i cant remember what its called and just a 1tb hardrive

item.title: Is my computer good enough to Host a server :S?
item.dc:creator: @primadude Primadude
item.description:
@primadude wrote:

Xionation:

Okay thanks

Install Linux; it uses the computer’s available memory much more efficiently and will be a lot better for hosting a server.

Read full topic

item.title: Is my computer good enough to Host a server :S?
item.dc:creator: @Mendorphinz Mendorphinz
item.description:
@Mendorphinz wrote:

Yeah, but loads of RAM doesn’t always mean good hosting.

Your internet speed and the stability of your server also is a factor, although quad core and 4GB RAM… I think you know it’s good enough.

Read full topic
item.source: Is my computer good enough to Host a server :S?
